directions: . place Tilapia fillets in a greased baking dish
spread fillets with minced garlic and sprinkle chunks of butter across the tops
pour wine and lemon juice over the top and add cracked black pepper to taste
Bake at 400 degrees for 30-35 minutes until fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork
Serve immediately, spooning extra sauce from the pan over the top of each fish
ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, cut into small pieces
title: Tilapia in White Wine, Garlic, and Butter Sauce
